result.eng: She went overseas looking for work.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.orig: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.html: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ṫar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.

result.eng: You will get it if you look for it.
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tú é ach é a lorg
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tú é ach é a lorg
result.html: Gheobhaidh tú é ach é a lorgYou will get it if you look for it.
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tú é aċ é a lorgYou will get it if you look for it.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.eng: I am looking for a job.
result.html: Tá mé ag lorg poistI am looking for a job.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag lorg poistI am looking for a job.

result.eng: It hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ga: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.orig: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.html: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin sé mé go mbeaḋ mo ṁáṫair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.
